name: State Tuition Exemption Program (STEP)
description: FREE tuition for Louisiana National Guard members for 5 academic years or until degree completion (associate, bachelor, master, or professional degree). One of the most comprehensive Guard education programs in the nation.
eligibility: Active Louisiana National Guard member in good standing
Pursuing associate, bachelor, master, or professional degree
benefit_amount: FREE tuition for 5 academic years or until degree

name: Patriot Scholarship (NEW August 2023)
description: NEW program launched August 2023 covering mandatory fees for undergraduate Louisiana National Guard members. Works WITH STEP program to provide debt-free undergraduate education.
benefit_amount: Covers mandatory fees (STEP covers tuition) = debt-free undergrad
how_to_apply: Apply through Louisiana National Guard Education Office at geauxguard.la.gov

name: Louisiana Title 29 Dependents' Educational Assistance
description: Tuition and school-imposed fee exemption for surviving spouses of deceased veterans, children of veterans with 90%+ disability, and children of 100% unemployable veterans. Valid for 4 years (must complete within 5 years). Covers any state college, university, trade, or vocational/technical school.
eligibility: Surviving spouse of deceased LA veteran OR child of 90%+ disabled LA veteran OR child of 100% unemployable LA veteran
Veteran lived in LA for 12 months before entering service
Student-imposed fees NOT exempt (school-imposed fees ARE exempt)
benefit_amount: FREE tuition + school-imposed fees for 4 years (5 year window)
how_to_apply: Apply through Louisiana Department of Veterans Affairs

name: In-State Tuition for Veterans and Dependents
description: In-state tuition rates granted to veterans, active-duty service members, and their dependents attending any Louisiana public college or university. Eligibility requirements apply.
eligibility: Veteran OR active-duty service member OR dependent
how_to_apply: Submit military documentation to institution's admissions/veterans office

name: Homestead Property Tax Exemption
description: Property tax exemption on first $7,500 assessed value available to qualifying veterans. Homestead exemption applies to primary residence.
how_to_apply: Apply with local parish assessor's office

name: Additional Exemption for Disabled Veterans
description: Additional $7,500 property tax exemption (total $15,000) for disabled veterans, active-duty KIA, or 100% service-connected/unemployable/totally disabled. Unremarried surviving spouse also eligible if remains owner and occupant.
eligibility: Disabled veteran OR active-duty KIA OR 100% VA rating
how_to_apply: Apply with local parish assessor with VA documentation

name: Combat Pay Tax Exemption
description: Military pay exempt from federal taxation (combat pay, hazardous duty pay) is also exempt from Louisiana state taxation.
eligibility: Receiving federally tax-exempt combat/hazardous duty pay
benefit_amount: 100% exemption on combat and hazardous duty pay
how_to_apply: Exclude from Louisiana income tax return (follows federal)

name: Military Retirement Benefits Tax Exemption
description: Military retirement benefits are completely exempt from Louisiana state income tax.
benefit_amount: 100% exemption on all military retirement income
how_to_apply: Exclude from Louisiana income tax return

name: Professional Licensure for Military Training
description: Louisiana veterans with military training and experience are granted civilian professional licensure and/or certification when awarded military occupational credentials. Accelerates transition to civilian employment.
eligibility: Military occupational specialty with civilian equivalent
benefit_amount: Professional license/certification credit for military training
how_to_apply: Apply through relevant Louisiana licensing board with military credentials

name: Louisiana Veterans' Homes
description: State-operated veterans' homes providing long-term nursing care and assisted living for eligible Louisiana veterans.
benefit_amount: Subsidized long-term care (rates vary by income)
how_to_apply: Contact Louisiana Department of Veterans Affairs

name: Veterans Assistance Foundation Emergency Financial Aid
description: Emergency financial assistance for Louisiana veterans facing hardships including housing, utility bills, and emergency needs.
how_to_apply: Contact Veterans Assistance Foundation of Louisiana (VAFL)

name: Veteran License Plates
description: Special veteran license plates available for Louisiana veterans with various designs for different service branches and medals.
how_to_apply: Apply through Louisiana OMV with DD-214
